content.raw: Sure, I'm happy with caches. My comments were about the new `save_value`, `get_saved_value` functions that don't seem related to the other caching changes. I thought the dataframe was effectively a cache of cross-routine values that was backed by the HDF5 file, so am not seeing the point of those new functions.
content.html: Sure, I'm happy with caches. My comments were about the new save_value, get_saved_value functions that don't seem related to the other caching changes. I thought the dataframe was effectively a cache of cross-routine values that was backed by the HDF5 file, so am not seeing the point of those new functions.
